00024 class Router : public Subscriber,Putter  {
00025     Subscriber localTopics;
00026     NetworkMessage localMessage;
00027 
00028 protected:
00029     Gateway* gateways[MAX_NUMBER_OF_GATEWAYS_PER_ROUTER];

00032 
00033 public:
00034     Router(bool forwardTopicReports_ = false, Gateway* gateway1=0, Gateway* gateway2=0, Gateway* gateway3=0, Gateway* gateway4=0); 
00035     virtual ~Router() {}
00036 
00037     /*
00038      * Networkmessages from all Gateway come in here
00039      */
00040     long put(const long topicId, const long len, const void* data, const NetMsgInfo& netMsgInfo);
00041 
00042     /*
00043      * Local Topics to send out come in here
00044      */
00045     bool putGeneric(const long topicId, const unsigned int len, const void* msg, const NetMsgInfo& netMsgInfo);
00046 
00047 
00048     /**
00049      * Gets called for every packet that enters this Router from local or from network.
00050      * Default implementation make routing descision with below functions for every Gateway added to this router
00051      */
00052     virtual void routeMsg(NetworkMessage &msg, long linkid);
00053 
00054 
00055     /*
00056      * Should this Message be routet in general?
00057      *
00058      */

00060 
00061     /**
00062      * Shoould this message be routet to this Gateway?
00063      */
00064     virtual bool shouldRouteThisMsgToGateway(NetworkMessage &msg, long linkid,Gateway* gateway);
00065 
00066     virtual void addGateway(Gateway* gateway);
